Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US — a land where anyone from anywhere can pick up their spatula for debate and comment publicly on any topic of their liking — and The Dutch — a population who definitely believes one must be related to you, or with sufficient reason be known to you personally, before having privileged first-name opinions over the internet.

The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, annoyed, or stressed you can see his finger tips go white. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three AVENGING FORCE films, all of which are based on the TV series.
